== Mulavana (628433) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Mulavana is a village in the [[Kollam]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 2674 hectares and harbouring 9289 households with total population of 35887 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 17038 and female population is 18849. Scheduled Caste Population is 4511 and Scheduled Tribes population is 72. Census Location Code of the village is 628433<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 31037 (86.49%)
* Literate male population: 14866 (87.25%)
* Literate female population: 16171 (85.79%)
